page.title: 20Traffic Surveys
page.content:
{MOTORWAY}At 10.20am we counted the M57 traffic for ten minutes. North bound were 111 cars, 30 vans, 43 lorries, 6 tankers, 2 buses and 1 motorbike. This made 193 vehicles. South bound were 107 cars, 26 vans, 63 lorries, 3 tankers and 1 coach: 200 vehicles. For 1 hour, multiply by 6: this makes 2358 vehicles using the motorway. At other times the numbers might be different.
{ESTATE} From 10am to 10.30am (In,Out). (61,71)cars, (22,20)vans, (0,7)buses, (10,7)lorries, (2,2)bikes, (6,5)taxis, (5,1)coaches, (1,0)ambulances, (0,2) motorbikes: total 222, or 444 an hour. We were quite surprised because we thought it to be fairly quiet.
Ayesha Talib
